TopicTitle: New Shots of the moon from hubsat1!

Articles.Content:
this just in shots from and of the hubsat are here!

Here is one of the moon

Here is one of the craft itself with a view of the telescope

You can also see a closer view of the craft

Hope you enjoyed it.
That first shot is really cool. How\'d you get the camera shot inside of it?
considering the title i was expecting more shots of the mun than the ship that took it
Is this that that telescope will do by default?

Is this that that telescope will do by default?

No I am going to post a tutorial video shortly on how to do it.

considering the title i was expecting more shots of the mun than the ship that took it

I\'m pretty proud of the ship. I wanted to post more too but I did this on a whim as my first post.

i do agree it is a very nice ship

does it have the capacity to take close images of mun/kerbin

what about images of minmus?

I think I will make a telescope mod at some point in the future with zoom or some edits of the camera rig to make the telescope function properly.

till then this is just a plain camera rig under the telescope model.

I have made a quick tutorial for you gents to enjoy.

http://youtu.be/1OH0Gxza4qQ

you will need the Camera pack http://svn.mumech.com/KSP/trunk/Releases/CameraPack_1.0.zip

then you will need the Probodobodyne diy kit Requires 0.14+

http://www./?duysujmlvcbxtyt

lastly something to place the strut on like a fuel tank or any body piece.
Excellent! Going to work now, plans for all celestial bodies!
